## Port.tryWrite() method

Write data to the port, failing if the port is full.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tryWrite(value: string | number) : boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string \| number | The data to be written |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if the data was written, false otherwise
